title: HoP 401 - Word Perfect - Logic and Language in Renaissance France
itunes:title: HoP 401 - Word Perfect - Logic and Language in Renaissance France
description: Jacques Lefèvre d’Étaples and Julius Caesar Scaliger fuse Aristotelianism with humanism to address problems in logic and literary aesthetics.
